mapper.insert:
select vol_program_no.nextval from dual
insert into volunteer_program ( program_no, program_title, recruit_stts, act_bgn_date, act_end_date, act_bgn_time, act_end_time, recruit_bgn_date, recruit_end_date, recruit_cnt, apply_cnt, program_ctg, adult_posbl, teen_posbl, recruit_name, act_place, mng_name, mng_tel, region_no, battach_oname, battach_data, battach_type, img_oname, img_data, img_type, location, enabled, content ) values ( #{programNo}, #{programTitle}, 1, #{actBgnDate}, #{actEndDate}, #{actBgnTime},#{actEndTime}, #{recruitBgnDate}, #{recruitEndDate}, #{recruitCnt}, 0, #{programCtg}, #{adultPosbl}, #{teenPosbl}, #{recruitName}, #{actPlace}, #{mngName}, #{mngTel}, #{regionNo}, #{battachOname}, #{battachData}, #{battachType}, #{imgOname}, #{imgData}, #{imgType}, #{location}, 1, #{content})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from volunteer_program where enabled = 1
and (act_bgn_date <= #{endDate}) and (act_end_date) >= #{startDate})
and region_no = #{regionNo}
and program_ctg = #{ctgNo}
and adult_posbl = 1
and teen_posbl = 1
and program_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and recruit_stts = 1
and recruit_stts = 2
mapper.update: update volunteer_program set enabled = 0 where program_no = #{programNo}

update volunteer_program set
recruit_stts = 2, apply_cnt = apply_cnt + 1
apply_cnt = apply_cnt + 1
where program_no = #{programNo}
mapper.select: SELECT program_no as programNo, program_title AS programTitle, recruit_stts AS recruitStts, act_bgn_date AS actBgnDate, act_end_date AS actEndDate, recruit_bgn_date AS recruitBgnDate, recruit_end_date AS recruitEndDate, recruit_cnt AS recruitCnt, apply_cnt AS applyCnt, img_oname AS imgOname, img_data AS imgData, img_type AS imgType FROM ( SELECT * FROM VOLUNTEER_PROGRAM ORDER BY program_no DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
